com.cmput301w18t26.taskit

Class TaskItSync

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w18t26.taskit.TaskItSync

  • public class TaskItSync
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles synchronization of filesystem and server Get the data from the filesystem (local) Get the data from the server (remote) Compare. Major cases: - Objects I do own (my user, task, bid) - local, not remote > push to remote - remote, not local > delete from remote - both > choose newest > update accordingly - Objects I do not own - local, not remote > delete from local - remote, not local > add to local - both > choose newest > update accordingly
    See Also:
    TaskItFile, TaskItData, TaskItServer
